# Board SDK

Put board sdk here.

# V4L2

V4L2 request libv4l2 on your build device. You may install it via:

```
sudo apt install libv4l-dev
```

Other dependencies will be downloaded and build by cmake.

# T31

```
T31/
|-- include
|   |-- imp
|   `-- sysutils
|-- lib
|   |-- glibc
|   `-- uclibc
`-- samples
    |-- libimp-samples
    `-- libsysutils-samples
```
